title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 257-5.3 - Standard
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 257-5.3 - Standard

State Regulations

Applicable statewide. In any one-hour period, the average
concentration of hydrogen sulfide shall not exceed 0.010 ppm (14
µg/m
3
). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
257-5.3

Renumbered from 257-10.3

New

York State Register November 27, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 48, eff. 12/7/2019

Amended

New

York State Register January 17, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 3, eff. 1/26/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
